meanings.definition: Small bulbs or bulb-like structures that develop on the stem or in the axils of leaves of certain plants.
meanings.sent1: The bulblets on the stem of the plant will grow into new plants.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners use bulblets to propagate certain types of flowers.
meanings.sent3: The bulblets on the stem played hide-and-seek with the leaves.
meanings.sent4: The bulblets were like tiny treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The bulblets sparkled in the sunlight, resembling miniature jewels.

meanings.definition: A small bulb or bulb-like structure that is used for propagation in plants.
meanings.sent1: Each bulblet is carefully planted to grow a new plant.
meanings.sent2: The bulblet was gently placed in the soil to take root.
meanings.sent3: The bulblet rolled away, trying to escape its planting destiny.
meanings.sent4: The bulblet held the promise of a flourishing garden.
meanings.sent5: The bulblet was a tiny powerhouse of growth potential.
